dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 679 fundus images containing questions about entire images and about randomly generated circular regions, with a total of 9,779 question-answer pairs for training, 2,380 for validation, and 1,311 for testing.
dcterms:title: DME-VQA

dcterms:creator: M. Allan
A. Shvets

dcterms:description: A dataset generated from the 2017 Robotic Instrument Segmentation dataset, containing binary questions about the presence of instruments in specified regions, with 15,580 QA pairs for training, 3,930 for validation, and 13,052 for testing.
dcterms:title: RIS-VQA

dcterms:creator: M. Fox
M. Taschwer
K. Schoeffmann
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of frames from cataract surgery videos, generated to include balanced binary questions about the presence of tools in specified regions, with 29,380 QA pairs for training, 5,306 for validation, and 4,322 for testing.
dcterms:title: INSEGCAT-VQA
